content.title: Volt MX App
content.body:
1. Connect your mobile device to your computer using a USB cable.
    For Android mobile devices, ensure that the use of USB is set as Transfer files.
    For iOS mobile devices, ensure that  trust has been established between your device and your computer.
  2. Launch the Volt MX App on your mobile device.
  3. Select the USB tab.
    On a successful connection, Iris on your computer shows a success prompt.
